Posts.Content: I was diagnosed with breast cancer 3 years ago now but just lately have been obsessed with checking myself for lumps - does anybody else find themselves doing this?
Posts.Title: Always Checking!

Posts.Content: Thanks Dorothee - glad to know am not going mad!!  I also had my yearly mammogram 4 weeks ago, not heard anything yet but as they say no news is good news and this maybe why I have it on my mind.  I may take your advice as the therapy sessions sound like a good idea.  Gail xx#
Posts.Title: Always Checking!
